code: @Test public void testBasicMapping() throws ConfigurationException {     Configuration originalConfig = new Configuration().     originalConfig.setString(RestOptions.ADDRESS, ADDRESS).     originalConfig.setString(RestOptions.BIND_ADDRESS, BIND_ADDRESS).     originalConfig.setString(RestOptions.BIND_PORT, BIND_PORT).     originalConfig.setInteger(RestOptions.SERVER_MAX_CONTENT_LENGTH, CONTENT_LENGTH).     originalConfig.setString(WebOptions.TMP_DIR, temporaryFolder.getRoot().getAbsolutePath()).     final RestServerEndpointConfiguration result = RestServerEndpointConfiguration.fromConfiguration(originalConfig).     Assert.assertEquals(ADDRESS, result.getRestAddress()).     Assert.assertEquals(BIND_ADDRESS, result.getRestBindAddress()).     Assert.assertEquals(BIND_PORT, result.getRestBindPortRange()).     Assert.assertEquals(CONTENT_LENGTH, result.getMaxContentLength()).     Assert.assertThat(result.getUploadDir().toAbsolutePath().toString(), containsString(temporaryFolder.getRoot().getAbsolutePath())). }
